job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: This is your dream position if you love providing actionable insights from sources like media buying platforms and customer journeys through the e-commerce cycle.THIS IS POSITION FOR OUR OFFICE IN SALT LAKE CITY, UTAH. ResponsibilitiesAnalyze raw data: assessing quality, cleansing, structuring for downstream processingCollaborate with the media buyer team to bring analytical insights to the realityGenerate actionable insights for business improvementsQualificationsBachelor's degree or equivalent experience in a quantitative field (Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering, information systems.)At least 1 - 2 years' of experience in analyticsExperience in gathering insights from google ads manager, Facebook, Shopify, Gemini, Acuity, taboola, etc.
